```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(moments)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(latex2exp)
getwd()

```

```{r}

air <- read.csv(file="./Data/Processed_KEY/EPAair_O3_PM25_NC1819_Processed.csv", header=TRUE, stringsAsFactors=TRUE)

```

```{r}

air_processed <- air %>%
  arrange(Date) %>%
  arrange(Site.Name) %>%
  select(Date, Site.Name, COUNTY, mean_Lat, mean_Lng, PM2.5, Ozone)
  
```

```{r}

fit_1 <- lm(formula = PM2.5 ~ 1, data = air_processed)
summary(fit_1)

fit_2 <- lm(formula = PM2.5 ~ Ozone, data = air_processed)
summary(fit_2)

fit_3 <- lm(formula = PM2.5 ~ mean_Lat, data = air_processed)
summary(fit_3)

fit_4 <- lm(formula = PM2.5 ~ mean_Lng, data = air_processed)
summary(fit_4)

```
